comments.body: I don't understand why `return messageString.indexOf('\{$placeholder\}') != -1` is insufficient, or perhaps something similar that allows for whitespace around the placeholder?

Discussed offline -- Basically, it's not just whitespace that needs to be checked for -- There is the cases where the placeholder is at the beginning of the string, in the middle of the string, and at the end of the string. The checks are slightly different for each case.

Also, it's not just whitespace -- As long as the characters are not alphabets and underscores (a-z, A-Z, and _), then it should be okay to not use curly braces, since the Dart code would treat everything else as part of the string and not part of the variable name.
The returned value is only used for test validation.
The required parameters will be nonnull when I do the null safety migration.

I replaced `_setUseDeferredLoading` with just a default of `false` 
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/76bc462520ba462f7bfe810db0f2f1a288f68e97/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/localizations/gen_l10n.dart#L901-L906
since that seemed to be intention of the `= false` in `initialize`
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/76bc462520ba462f7bfe810db0f2f1a288f68e97/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/localizations/gen_l10n.dart#L690

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +577,581 @@      preferredSupportedLocales: preferredSupportedLocalesFromLocales(preferredSupportedLocales),
      header: headerFromFile(headerString, headerFile, inputDirectory),
      useDeferredLoading: useDeferredLoading ?? false,
      untranslatedMessagesFile: _untranslatedMessagesFileFromPath(fileSystem, untranslatedMessagesFile),
      inputsAndOutputsListFile: _inputsAndOutputsListFileFromPath(fileSystem, inputsAndOutputsListPath),

comments.body: I made sure `options` is never passed in as null in the unsafe code.

`bundle.translationFor(message)` is nullable, but the call sites make sure `bundle.translationFor(message)` is nonnull before this is called.  Instead of passing in the bundle, pass in the already promoted translation.
Same as `_generatePluralMethod`, pass in the promoted translation instead.
These were set in `loadResources`.  Move them to `late final`s so they can be nonnull and lazily loaded.
